resources.string: nothing found, please try another item
Connection Error, try the offline mode
Enter what you are looking for
Touch a row to select an entry
Touch the marked area to view the rack
Nothing found, please try another searchword
Too many results please be more specific
Use this Button to view the whole database and select an entry to get more details
To get offline results you have to press Show All with connection at least once
You are now able to activate or deactivate the offline mode
